content.new: With the release of Ubuntu 18.04, and ROS melodic our team began migrating to these newer, updated platforms. However the VMRC packages are not currently supported on ROS melodic and thus we would have to revert back to Ubuntu 16.04 in order to use the simulation. I was wondering if the packages are going to be migrated over to ROS melodic in the near future?
content.old: With the release of Ubuntu 18.04, and ROS melodic our team began migrating to these newer, updated platforms. However the VMRC packages are not currently supported on ROS melodic and thus we have to install kinetic side by side and source the terminal (or uninstall ROS melodic completely) in order to use the simulation. I was wondering if the packages are going to be migrated over to ROS melodic in the near future?

issue.title: VMRC Package support for ROS melodic
